title: Variable related to /dev/tty
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
Since "go test" has stdin connected to /dev/null, then, I think, that the
package os should have the variable Tty pointing to file /dev/tty

    Tty  = NewFile(syscall.Tty, "/dev/tty")

so be used when we have functions using "os.Stdin".
